name: token-event-photo-git-pages
description:
This is an interactive web-based photo booth application designed for events. Users can take a picture using their device's webcam, which is then automatically branded with a custom logo and text. After approving the photo, a unique QR code is generated, allowing users to easily download the final image to their own devices.

The project is built with a modern tech stack including React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, and it now uploads images directly to a public GitHub repository instead of using Supabase for cloud storage. This approach allows images to be publicly accessible via GitHub, making it easy to share and download the photos.
